body:
A little late, but as promised, we have set up a site for you and your colleagues to vote on the location of next year's workshop.  Please go to:

http://radsite.lbl.gov/limesurvey/index.php?sid=61285

and adjust the sliders.  Rather than a preference rating, we are looking for an honest assessment of your own probability of attendance for each possible venue.  You have the next two weeks, until the end of November, to cast your vote.  Please, just one response per person.

Our thanks to Danny Fuller for putting this together for us.

Cheers,
-Greg
subject: [Radiance-general] Survey for next year's Radiance Workshop
